Crucially, he will release the 21st installment of Rs 18,000 crore under the PM-KISAN scheme, benefiting nine crore farmers.

description: Major online services like ChatGPT and Claude faced widespread disruption due to a Cloudflare technical glitch. Users encountered a 'Please unblock challenges.cloudflare.com to proceed' error, indicating a malfunction in Cloudflare's security verification system. The outage, which began around 6:00 AM ET, impacted numerous websites relying on Cloudflare's network for security and performance.

description: MacKenzie Scott, ex-wife of Jeff Bezos, has donated $19.25 billion through Yield Giving, inspired by her own college struggles.  Generosity from a dentist and a roommate, who loaned her $1,000 to prevent dropping out, profoundly shaped her philanthropic approach.  These acts of kindness continue to fuel her commitment to supporting underserved communities.

description: Houston Rockets, surprisingly strong early, are exploring a blockbuster trade for Kyrie Irving to fill the void left by Fred VanVleet's season-ending injury. This move would reunite Irving with Kevin Durant, a partnership that previously generated significant excitement. The proposed deal involves trading VanVleet and Dorian Finney-Smith for Irving, offering Houston a veteran playmaker and elite scorer.

title: Trey Benson injury update: Cardinals coach assesses recovery amid slump
description: Arizona Cardinals running back Trey Benson, who replaced an injured James Conner, is sidelined with a brutal knee injury sustained in Week 5. Despite initial hopes for a Week 10 return, his recovery timeline remains unclear. Head coach Jonathan Gannon stated Benson is progressing but not yet ready to play, marking his sixth missed game.

title: Candace Owens sparks chaos with new Britney trafficking claim as Lou Taylor trends
description: Britney Spears shared a heartwarming Instagram video with Kim and Khloé Kardashian, sparking viral attention. Simultaneously, Candace Owens leveled serious accusations on her podcast, alleging Lou Taylor's manipulative control over Britney and other stars, citing an insider email and historical patterns of financial and media exploitation. Owens' claims, though unproven, have ignited significant discussion.
